name: Dragon Slayer: The Legend of Heroes II
name_original: Dragon Slayer: The Legend of Heroes II
description: Dragon Slayer: The Legend of Heroes II is a role-playing video game developed by Nihon Falcom Corporation, part of the Dragon Slayer series and the second entry in the sub-series The Legend of Heroes. It was first released in 1992 for the NEC PC-8801. Over the next few years, it was also ported to the NEC PC-9801, FM Towns, PC Engine, Mega Drive, Super Famicom and MS-DOS.
